title: Video: Mother Leopard Fights A Lion Head-On, Saves 2 Cubs In Africa
content: In a remarkable display of motherly love and courage, a video is doing rounds of the internet in which a mother leopard is seen fighting a lion head-on, to save her two cubs.
summary: In a remarkable display of motherly love and courage, a video is doing rounds of the internet in which a mother leopard is seen fighting a lion head-on, to save her two cubs.

title: Trump Wins Big As Republicans Bag "Trifecta" Of Victories. How It Helps Him
content: Donald Trump is likely to get a healthy majority in the Senate this time around. However, despite that he may not have the magic 60 seats that would allow him to overcome opposition attempts to delay legislation.
summary: Donald Trump is likely to get a healthy majority in the Senate this time around. However, despite that he may not have the magic 60 seats that would allow him to overcome opposition attempts to delay legislation.

title: 2025's Hottest Dating Trends: Survey Highlights Micromance, Future-Proofing
content: More than 40,000 Gen Z and millennial Bumble users worldwide, including over 2,000 singles in India, participated in the survey.

title: Rising Seas To Cost Pacific Island Nations $10 Billion - Their 20-Year GDP
content: Adapting to a sea level rise of up to 0.5 metres (1.64 feet) will cost the three most vulnerable Pacific atoll nations nearly $10 billion - equivalent to about 20 years of gross domestic product - the World Bank said in a report on Thursday.
summary: Adapting to a sea level rise of up to 0.5 metres (1.64 feet) will cost the three most vulnerable Pacific atoll nations nearly $10 billion - equivalent to about 20 years of gross domestic product - the World Bank said in a report on Thursday.

title: "Against Bureaucracy Back Then Too": Vivek Ramaswamy Reacts To Viral Speech

title: Boeing To Fire 10% Workforce, 17,000 Employees Set To Be Sacked
content: Boeing Co. will start sending out pink slips on Wednesday to employees affected by a planned round of job cuts, a delicate balancing act between improving efficiency and keeping together a skilled workforce to help lift output again.
summary: Boeing Co. will start sending out pink slips on Wednesday to employees affected by a planned round of job cuts, a delicate balancing act between improving efficiency and keeping together a skilled workforce to help lift output again.

title: Watch: Musk And Trump's 'God Bless America' Performance Goes Viral

title: Who Is Tulsi Gabbard, US Intel Chief Who Will Oversee 18 Spy Agencies
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has named former Democratic representative-turned-staunch supporter Tulsi Gabbard as the Director of National Intelligence for his second term. As part of her job, she will oversee 18 spy agencies in the US.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump has named former Democratic representative-turned-staunch supporter Tulsi Gabbard as the Director of National Intelligence for his second term. As part of her job, she will oversee 18 spy agencies in the US.

title: Strikes Hit Lebanon's Beirut Shortly After Israel's Evacuation Warning
content: A plume of grey smoke rose over the area after the latest strike since Israel sharply intensified its campaign against the Iran-backed group in September.

title: 50 Years Ago, Discovery Of This Fossil Changed Understanding Of Evolution
content: A fossilised skeleton, Australopithecus afarensis, best known by her nickname 'Lucy', was unearthed by researchers 50 years ago this month in the Afar region of Ethiopia.
summary: A fossilised skeleton, Australopithecus afarensis, best known by her nickname 'Lucy', was unearthed by researchers 50 years ago this month in the Afar region of Ethiopia.

title: South Korea's 'Morphing Wheel' Could Make Wheelchairs Climb Stairs
content: The morphing wheel consists of an outer hoop of a chain and a series of spoke wires running through the hub.

title: Chinese Woman's Illegal Surrogacy Case Sparks Debate Online
content: A 22-year-old Chinese woman's account of how she was lured into the country's illegal surrogacy industry before suffering a miscarriage went viral on Chinese social media this week.

title: Dominica To Award Its Highest National Honour To PM Modi
content: The Commonwealth of Dominica will honour Prime Minister Narendra Modi with its highest national award, the Dominica Award of Honour, in recognition of his contributions to Dominica during the COVID-19 pandemic.
summary: The Commonwealth of Dominica will honour Prime Minister Narendra Modi with its highest national award, the Dominica Award of Honour, in recognition of his contributions to Dominica during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: "Quite Disturbing": Human Head Found On Popular Tourist Beach In Florida
content: Locals said the disturbing find has left them traumatised, with some saying that they are now too scared to go to the beach.

title: Cannabis Consumption Can Increase Risk Of Cancer: Study
content: Cannabis consumption can cause damage to our body's cells and increase the risk of highly cancerous tumours, according to a new study on Thursday.
summary: Cannabis consumption can cause damage to our body's cells and increase the risk of highly cancerous tumours, according to a new study on Thursday.

title: Meet The 35-Year-Old YouTuber Who Is Exploring What It Means To Be A Man
content: A YouTuber recently embarked on a new chapter of his life as a transgender man. Ash Perez, a member of the online content creators community Try Guys, documented his journey of exploration of masculinity in a video series called New Guy Tries.

title: How Much Money Do You Need To Afford A House In US
content: Want to buy a home in the United States? Well, think about it only if you earn at least $1,08,000 (around Rs 91.15 lakh) or more, a report said.
summary: Want to buy a home in the United States? Well, think about it only if you earn at least $1,08,000 (around Rs 91.15 lakh) or more, a report said.

title: UK Magic Society Expelled Woman Posing As Man. Now They Want Her Back
content: Sophie Lloyd, an actress, posed as a man named Raymond to gain entry into the Magic Circle, an all-male club. She faced expulsion from society for "deliberate deception" in 1991 after she came clean.
summary: Sophie Lloyd, an actress, posed as a man named Raymond to gain entry into the Magic Circle, an all-male club. She faced expulsion from society for "deliberate deception" in 1991 after she came clean.
